check.name: IllegalThrows
check.description: Checks that specified types are not declared to be thrown. Declaring that a method throws {@code java.lang.Error} or {@code java.lang.RuntimeException} is almost never acceptable.

property.name: ignoreOverriddenMethods
property.description: Allow to ignore checking overridden methods (marked with {@code Override} or {@code java.lang.Override} annotation).

property.name: ignoredMethodNames
property.description: Specify names of methods to ignore.

property.default-value: Error, RuntimeException, Throwable, java.lang.Error, java.lang.RuntimeException, java.lang.Throwable
property.name: illegalClassNames
property.description: Specify throw class names to reject.
